Title: Requires labels identifying the country of origin on certain dental restoration products
Summary: Requires labels identifying the country of origin on certain dental restoration products, including crowns, bridges, dentures and similar products; requires dentists to disclose the country of origin to the patient prior to applying or implanting such devices; imposes a civil penalty on the manufacturer per violation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring labels identifying the country of origin on certain dental restoration products
